content: hi , i was reading rust's book (https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/) and i was wondering if i could translate it (idk if there is a translate team or note) but i really like the project and would like to help spreading it (i can translate to portuguese) :)

@bodstone Hello, you can always fork and translate the book. We currently don't have a way to host it on rust-lang though. There are some changes to mdbook that could make this possible, but they haven't been accepted yet. We can only accept translations for the website at the moment.
